mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.drawer_no AS "drawerNo", a.cabinet_id AS "cabinetId", a.cabinet_no AS "cabinetNo", a.drawer_status AS "drawerStatus", a.food_status AS "foodStatus", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.product_id as "productId", a.product_name as "productName", a.in_time as "inTime", a.in_out_time as "inOutTime", areaProvince.id as "provinceId", areaProvince.name as "cabinetProvinceName", areaCity.id as "cityId", areaCity.name as "cabinetCityName", area.id as "areaId", area.name as "cabinetAreaName"
LEFT JOIN cabinet b ON b.id = a.cabinet_id left join sys_area areaProvince on areaProvince.id=b.province left join sys_area areaCity on areaCity.id=b.city left join sys_area area on area.id=b.area
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drawer( id, drawer_no, cabinet_id, cabinet_no, drawer_status, food_status, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{drawerNo}, #{cabinetId}, #{cabinetNo}, #{drawerStatus}, #{foodStatus}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE drawer SET drawer_no = #{drawerNo}, cabinet_id = #{cabinetId}, cabinet_no = #{cabinetNo}, drawer_status = #{drawerStatus}, food_status = #{foodStatus}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE drawer SET food_status=0, in_time = null, in_out_time = null, product_id=null, product_name=null where drawer_no=#{drawerNo} and cabinet_no=#{cabinetNo}

UPDATE drawer SET food_status=1, in_time = now(), product_id=#{productId}, product_name=#{productName}, in_out_time = date_add(now(), interval 3 hour) where drawer_no=#{drawerNo} and cabinet_no=#{cabinetNo}
mapper.select: select area.id as areaId, area.name as areaName, cabinet.cabinet_nos as cabinetNo, cabinet.cabinet_name as cabinetName, cabinet.area as area, drawer.drawer_no as drawerNo, drawer.drawer_status as drawerStatus, drawer.food_status as foodStatus from cabinet cabinet join drawer drawer on cabinet.cabinet_nos=drawer.cabinet_no join sys_area area on area.id=cabinet.area where cabinet.cabinet_nos=#{cabinetNo} and drawer.drawer_no=#{drawerNo};

select drawer.id AS "id", drawer.drawer_no AS "drawerNo", drawer.cabinet_id AS "cabinetId", drawer.cabinet_no AS "cabinetNo", drawer.drawer_status AS "drawerStatus", drawer.food_status AS "foodStatus", drawer.create_time AS "createTime", drawer.product_id as "productId", drawer.product_name as "productName", drawer.in_time as "inTime", drawer.in_out_time as "inOutTime" from cabinet cabinet join drawer drawer on cabinet.cabinet_nos=drawer.cabinet_no join sys_area area on area.id=cabinet.area where cabinet.cabinet_nos=#{cabinetNo} and drawer.drawer_no=#{drawerNo};

SELECT
FROM cabinet_product_relaction cabinet_product_relaction JOIN drawer a ON a.drawer_no = cabinet_product_relaction.drawer_no
WHERE a.cabinet_id =#{cabinetId} AND cabinet_product_relaction.product_id =#{productId} AND a.drawer_status=1 and a.food_status in(0,1)
mapper.update: UPDATE drawer set food_status=#{foodStatus} where drawer_no=#{drawerNo}
